description: Product Description TOTAL UPPER BOOY WORKOUT BAR Turn your doorway into a home gym. The KAKICLAY pull up bar is a multi-function exercise bar you can use to do pull-ups, chin-ups, push-ups, sit-ups, dips, arm and shoulder exercises- every exercise you need to build a powerful upper body! The KAKICLAY gym uses your body's own resistance to deliver powerful results fast. It strengthens and tones your biceps, triceps, chest, back, shoulders and abs. It instantly attaches to or removes from your door frame with no drilling or tools required, and the heavy duty steel construction supports up to 440 ibs! Now it's easy to get the strong, lean body you always wanted, right at home. features: 【Multifunctional Home Gym】The latest pull-up bar supports push-ups, sit-ups, pull-ups, pull-ups, arm curls, arm and shoulder exercises, and other exercises. You can easily switch between multiple exercises without other fitness door bars to help you build strong upper body and core muscles.

【Ergonomic Design】KAKICLAY Pull Up Bar is an ideal upper body exercise equipment with three grip positions, narrow, wide, and neutral. The handle is equipped with ergonomic comfort foam for a comfortable grip, non-slip and wear resistance to protect your wrists and relieve fatigue during exercising.

【Door Frame Protection】The top of this pull-up bar is equipped with thickened foam to protect the top of the door frame from damage. Also the pull-up bar is equipped with foam handles on the outside and inside, which can effectively prevent damage to the sides of the door frame.

【Easy Installation】Our door frame puller is simple to install with safety brackets, safety manuals and assembly tools, making it easy to install and remove in seconds. It uses leverage against the door frame, so there is no drilling required and no damage to the door. The pull up bar is 36.5" long and fits any standard door opening from 24" to 32" wide and 4" to 6.3" deep. It holds up to 440 lbs.

【No Worry Buying】Before using the upper body workout bar tug down on the grips to make sure the unit is securely installed into door frame. Any problems please feel free to contact us by email, we will solve it for you as soon as possible. And we offer 24 months manufacturer’s warranty.

title: Pull Up Bar for Doorway: Sportneer Strength Training Pull-up Bars without Screw - Adjustable Width Locking Mechanism Chin Up Bar, Thickened Steel Max Limit 440 lbs Upper Body Fitness Pullup Bars for Home (Black-Red)
features: Before purchasing, please make sure that the size of your door frame is 29.5 in-37 in (75 cm-94 cm). This Chin up Bar is not suitable for door frame widths outside this range; The width of the door frame must be wider than the width of the anti-slip pads at both ends of the pull up bar

To ensure safety, the manual specifies a maximum load of 297 lbs (135 kg). Testing shows the product can handle up to 744 lbs (337.5 kg) of instantaneous load, meeting a 2.5x safety factor. However, the pull up bar's capacity also depends on the usage environment. Users should strictly adhere to the 135 kg limit

No Drilling, No Traces: The pull-up bar uses innovative fixative technology to stay in place. It features two large 6.5 x 1.8-inch PVC mats for added friction and stability. Four metal fixed points connect the base and bar, ensuring a secure, fall-proof design even under heavy loads

Heavy Duty Construction: Our Pull Up Bar supports up to 440 lbs (200 kg) with its 2 mm outer and 1.5 mm inner steel pipes. This pull-up bar built to last without deforming or breaking, ensuring durability for your home gym. Note: Longer use distances may reduce the load of chin-up bar

Upgraded Mechanic Lock System: This push-up bar features a new 360-degree rotatable dual gear lock on both ends to protect the bar from loosening. The doorway exercise bar has passed extensive testing, ensuring safety and sturdiness for confident use

Easy Installation: Install quickly with detailed instructions, a video guide, and arrow markers on the chin-up bar. Spirit levels on both ends ensure correct setup. Ensure your doorway or wall is solid; avoid ceramic tiles, glass or non-solid doorframe. Note: Verify the marked rotation direction; reversing it may cause locking

Integrated, Extensible Structure: Unlike most 2-section foam bars, this doorway pull up bar features an ultra long, integrated anti-slip cotton handlebar for a flexible grip. It's sweat-resistant, odorless, and durable. Twist the bar to adjust its length from 29.5 to 37 inches (75 to 94 cm) for various workouts like pull-ups, sit-ups, push-ups, stretching and more

title: Ultimate Body Press Ceiling Mount Pull Up Bar for 8 Foot Ceilings, Steel Through-Bolted 48” Straight Bar with 14” Risers, Fits 16”and 24” Joist Spacing, Max 450lbs, USA Designed and Backed
description: The Performance Engineered Pull Up Bar The Ceiling Mount Pull Up Bar for 8' Ceilings is the mounted pull up bar that brings real performance to every workout. The pull up bar is designed specifically for 8 foot ceilings or any space where 14 inch risers suit your needs. Overhead mounting gives you full range of motion while preserving the flexibility of your floor space. Installation is easy with 48 inch on-center mounting plates for a universal fit to all 16 or 24 inch joists. Value and Versatility The Ceiling Mount Bar is tough enough for commercial duty and compliments the look of your home with a white powdercoat finish and contrasting black bar. 1.25" diameter straight bar is comfortable in your hand and an easy fit for everyone in your family. Mounted in your gym and always ready to go, the Ceiling Mount Pull Up Bar inspires frequent workouts and delivers results.   Easy Universal Fit MountingMounting could not be easier, 48" on-center wall brackets work perfectly for homes with either 16" or 24" ceiling joists. Complete assembly instructions and mounting hardware are included and all Ultimate Body Press gear comes with USA tech support and the our 100% satisfaction guarantee.   Shop with ConfidenceAt Ultimate Body Press we are proud to serve your gym needs and want to exceed your expectations for customer service. Customer service has complete resources to assist you and is available by phone or email. Your satisfaction is 100% guaranteed, order your Ceiling Mount Pull Up Bar today.
features: IDEAL FOR 8' CEILINGS: Add gym-grade workouts to any room with 8 foot ceilings or any space where 14” risers suit your needs. Straight 48 inch bar offers ample room to build arms, chest, shoulders, back and core with full range of motion workouts

UNIVERSAL CEILING MOUNT: 48 inch on-center mounting plates fit all joists in typical residential framing. 48 inches spans two 24 inch joists at the top of your house and below floors, the bar spans three 16 inch joists. Complete hardware is included

NEW THROUGH-BOLT BAR FOR 2020: Jig welded square tube steel risers are through-bolted to the bar to eliminate rotation under heavy power. Results pile on fast with an ultra stable bar that is always ready to go
IDEAL ANCHOR FOR OPTIONAL ACCESSORIES: Anchor Ultimate Body Press Ab Straps and Gymnastic Rings for highly metabolic full body workouts and assisted pull up variations. (accessories sold separately)

DESIGNED IN THE USA: Ultimate Body Press is a North Carolina company committed to delivering better workouts every day. Includes Prime eligible shipping, USA customer service and 30 day no-hassle return policy
SHOP WITH CONFIDENCE: The Elevated Doorway Pull Up Bar is backed by Ultimate Body Press against manufacturer's defects for 10 years
